verbs.description: [V: Did] Donald Trump personally push the U.S. Postmaster General to raise Amazon 's postal rates ? If so , it 's a striking addition to the president 's list of scandals

Did [ARG0: Donald Trump] [ARGM-MNR: personally] [V: push] [ARG1: the U.S. Postmaster General] [ARG2: to raise Amazon 's postal rates] ? If so , it 's a striking addition to the president 's list of scandals
